i18n.chi: 靠廢柴技能【狀態異常】成為最強的我將蹂躪一切
i18n.eng: Failure Frame: I Became the Strongest and Annihilated Everything with Low-Level Spells
i18n.jpn: ハズレ枠の[状態異常スキル]で最強になった俺がすべてを蹂躙するまで
i18n.qro: Hazure Waku no [Jôtai Ijô Skill] de Saikyô ni Natta Ore ga Subete wo Jûrin Suru made

tag.name: Hazure Waku no [Jôtai Ijô Skill] de Saikyô ni Natta Ore ga Subete wo Jûrin Suru made
